name: Azuren OS
tagline: An OS running on the browser
body:
### Description
Azuren OS is a web based OS, built on Windows Azure. It's flexible, powerful and easy to develop apps on it. 
For demo : http://azuren.chinacloudapp.cn/

### Documentation

[Metro App Development Guide](WikiPage)
